Text: this is strange, there are no files if i am correct
It's because you should click on "get torrent file" and not "get this torrent" (I don't know why but for me it's like that for every torrent since a few days)
Anyone know where to find english subtitles for this file? can't seem to find any....

For those who use a Seagate FreeAgent Theater+, you need to "remove header compression" first for the video to work.  Search for the program "mkvmerge", and "remove header compression", and there should be an easy how-to online.  Only takes a few minutes to do.

As for this torrent:

A/V - Great, excellent, no complaints here.

Movie - Very disappointing.  The story felt very familiar, like something I had seen before, with minor alterations.  I wouldn't recommend.
